dct_title_s: [Holy Land satellite imagery] : the Holy Land satellite database project, ROHR Productions Ltd. and C.N.E.S. (5. Netanya)
dct_description_sm: Shows Israel, Jordan, and the Golan Heights. "The Holy Land database project: This 10 m pixel imagery was made by merging the 28.5 m data from NASA's LANDSAT 5 satellite with the French SPOT satellite. The result is an accurate, true-color, photo-realistic, satellite map of the area as of January 18, 1987." Satellite imagery copyright: ROHR Productions Ltd. and C.N.E.S. "New Israel grid superimposed." "Published March 2000 by Dr. John K. Hall, Geological Survey of Israel." Each sheet has different GSI report number, e.g.: Nazareth, GSI report, GSI/4/2000. PUL has sheets 4-15.
